mapper.select: /* getVirtualAcntDetailList */ SELECT SMVA.VRT_ORG_CD ,SUBSTRING(SMVA.VRT_ACNT,1,6) + '-' + SUBSTRING(SMVA.VRT_ACNT,7,2) + '-' + SUBSTRING(SMVA.VRT_ACNT,9,6) AS VRT_ACNT ,IFNULL(SMVA.APPLY_TYPE,'') AS OBJ_TARGET ,IFNULL(SMVA.ACNT_NM,'') AS OBJ_NM ,IFNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CONVERT(DATE,SMVA.ISSN_DATE),120),'') AS ISSN_DATE ,IFNULL(( SELECT TOP 1 CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CONVERT(DATE,tr_il),120) FROM [VACS].[dbo].[vacs_ahst] WHERE iacct_no = SMVA.VRT_ACNT ORDER BY tr_il DESC ),'') AS LAST_TRANS_DATE FROM T_STD_MAST_VRT_ACNT SMVA WHERE SMVA.VRT_ORG_CD = #{VRT_ORG_CD} AND SMVA.OBJ_CD IS NOT NULL
